thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Bristol-Myers Squibb Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.91

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bristol-Myers Squibb Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.91
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Bristol-Myers Squibb Co:
* BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB REPORTS FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.94
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.91 * Q1 REVENUE $5.2 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $5.23 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.70 TO $2.80 * QTRLY SPRYCEL WORLDWIDE REVENUE $438 MILLION VERSUS $463 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* QTRLY OPDIVO WORLDWIDE REVENUE $1,511 MILLION VERSUS $1,127 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* INCREASING 2018 NON-GAAP EPS GUIDANCE RANGE FROM $3.15 - $3.30 TO $3.35 - $3.45
* QTRLY ELIQUIS WORLDWIDE REVENUE $1,506 MILLION VERSUS $1,101 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* QTRLY YERVOY WORLDWIDE REVENUE $249 MILLION VERSUS $330 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* SEES 2018 WORLDWIDE REVENUES INCREASING IN MID-SINGLE DIGITS
* U.S. REVENUES INCREASED 1% TO $2.8 BILLION IN THE QUARTER COMPARED TO THE SAME PERIOD A YEAR AGO
* QTRLY INTERNATIONAL REVENUES INCREASED 10% Source text for Eikon:
